alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:48AM CDT until April 05 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR WESTERN VAN ZANDT COUNTY... At 1247 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Canton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Canton, Grand Saline, Mabank, Edgewood, Fruitvale and Purtis Creek State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
